# 2024 Ohio Republican presidential primary

Trump
| image1 = January 2025 Official Presidential Portrait of Donald J. Trump.jpg

| color1 = 283681
| home_state1 = Florida
| popular_vote1 = 896,059
| percentage1 = 79.21%
| delegate_count1 = 79
| image2 = Nikki Haley (53299447738) (cropped).jpg
| candidate2 = Nikki Haley  (withdrawn)
| color2 = FE6100
| home_state2 = South Carolina
| popular_vote2 = 162,563

| reporting =

| time_zone =
}}
The 2024 Ohio Republican presidential primary was held on March 19, 2024, as part of the Republican Party primaries for the 2024 presidential election. 79 delegates to the 2024 Republican National Convention were allocated on a winner-take-all basis. The contest was held alongside primaries in Arizona, Florida, Illinois, and Kansas.
Candidates
The filing deadline for the Ohio primary was on December 20, 2023, and the office of the Secretary of State of Ohio published the list of certified candidates on January 9, 2024.
*Donald Trump
*Chris Christie (withdrew January 10, 2024)
*Ron DeSantis (withdrew January 21, 2024)
*Nikki Haley (withdrew March 6, 2024)
*Vivek Ramaswamy (withdrew January 15, 2024)
Endorsements
}}
}}
U.S. Representatives
*Troy Balderson, OH-12 (2018–present)
*Mike Carey, OH-15 (2021–present)
*Bill Johnson, OH-06 (2011–2024)
*Jim Jordan, OH-04 (2007–present)
* Bob McEwen, OH-06 (1981–1993)
*Max Miller, OH-07 (2023–present)
*Mike Turner, OH-10 (2013–present) and OH-03 (2003–2013)
State executive officials
*Jon Husted, 66th Lieutenant Governor of Ohio (2019–2025) and 50th Secretary of State of Ohio (2011–2019)
*Frank LaRose, 51st Secretary of State of Ohio (2019–present); candidate for U.S. Senator in 2024
*Josh Mandel, 48th Treasurer of Ohio (2011–2019)
*Robert Sprague, 49th Treasurer of Ohio (2019–present)
State senators
*Niraj Antani, 6th district (2021–2024)
*Michael Rulli, 33rd district (2019–2024)
*Shane Wilkin, 17th district (2023–present)
State representatives
*Jon Cross, 83rd district (2019–2025)
*Jennifer Gross, 45th district (2023–present) and 52nd district (2021–2022)
*Candice Keller, 53rd district (2016–2020)
*Derek Merrin, 42nd district (2023–present) and 47th district (2016–2022)
*Craig Riedel, 82nd district (2017–2022)
Local official
*Trent R. Conaway, Mayor of East Palestine (2020–present)
Party officials
*Bob Paduchik, co-chair of the Republican National Committee (2017–2019); chair of the Ohio Republican Party (2021–2023)
*Alex Triantafilou, chair of the Ohio Republican Party (2023–present)
Individuals
*Bernie Moreno, businessman; candidate for U.S. Senator in 2024 and 2022
*Vivek Ramaswamy, businessman, candidate for U.S. President in 2024
Organization
*Ohio Republican Party
*David Joyce, OH-14 (2013–present)
Governors
*Mike DeWine, Governor of Ohio (2019–present)
*John Kasich, Governor of Ohio (2011–2019); candidate for president in 2000 and 2016
}}
